diet lifestyle recommend study Females child bear potential must agree use appropriate birth control method entire study period Stable concomitant medication Understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study investigator Presence active gastrointestinal disease Malabsorption disorder Pancreatitis influence gastrointestinal function antibiotic , laxative , opioids , anticholinergic , antidiarrheal ( must stop least 3 month study start ) Subjects pregnant lactate Any medication use product treatment obesity ( e.g. , Xenical , fat binder , fat burner , satiety product etc . ) Subjects currently carbohydrate protein diet , low fat diet More 3 hour strenuous physical activity per week
